attributes.action: Cancel Channel 4 Show Location Location Location
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As Channel 4 is a public-service channel it should be more stringently censored. The list on this show naming and shaming the 'worst' towns in Britain is provocative and has offended countless people in the towns on this list. I call on the Government to cancel this disgusting show.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
